changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO ${table.prefix}_USER_GROUP_USERS SELECT g.${table.prefix}_ID AS ${table.prefix}_USER_GROUP_ID, u.${table.prefix}_ID AS ${table.prefix}_USERS_ID FROM ${table.prefix}_USER_GROUP g, ${table.prefix}_USER u WHERE g.${table.prefix}_NAME = 'ORION ADMIN USERS' AND u.${table.prefix}_ROLE_ID = ( SELECT ${table.prefix}_ID FROM ${table.prefix}_USER_ROLE WHERE ${table.prefix}_NAME = 'ADMINISTRATOR' ) ORDER BY u.${table.prefix}_ID ASC;
